Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Fire control computer error. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Countermeasure Dispenser component.
Inspection revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 28/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi
